Text: it has a nice color screen .  it is small .  radio is awsome , but it does n't work unless you have the earpice in .  that is a major minus , but its not that bad .  t- t-mobile was a pretty good server .  it has 2 games .  they are not wowable good .  you have to buy better ones .  it also does n't have voice activated dialing . big minus ! !
